trans-unit.source: Represents a membership condition that matches all code.
trans-unit.target: 表示成員資格條件︰ 比對所有的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This membership condition is usually used on the root code group of a policy level so that the policy applies to all code.
trans-unit.target: 使原則套用到所有的程式碼原則層級的根程式碼群組通常會用於這個成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的辨識項是否符合成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: All code is a match for <xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition>, so Check always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所有程式碼是符合<xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition>，讓核取永遠都會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: The evidence set against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 設定要進行測試的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立對等成員資格條件的複本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前的成員資格條件的相同新複本。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified membership condition is an <xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的成員資格條件是否<xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to <xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件<xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified membership condition is an <xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的成員資格條件是<xref href="System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context used to resolve named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 用來解析具名使用權限集合參考原則層級的內容。

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The e parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: e 參數不是有效的成員資格條件的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的成員資格條件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前的成員資格條件雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回成員資格條件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件的表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性物件和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全性物件，包含所有狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性物件和其目前的狀態與指定的 XML 編碼方式<xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context for resolving named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 原則層級內容，來解析具名使用權限集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全性物件，包含所有狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。
